content.query:
IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.external_file_formats WHERE name = 'SynapseParquetFormat') 
	CREATE EXTERNAL FILE FORMAT [SynapseParquetFormat] 
	WITH ( FORMAT_TYPE = PARQUET)
GO

IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.external_data_sources WHERE name = 'staging_asablobacct_dfs_core_windows_net') 
	CREATE EXTERNAL DATA SOURCE [staging_asablobacct_dfs_core_windows_net] 
	WITH (
		LOCATION = 'abfss://staging@asablobacct.dfs.core.windows.net', 
		TYPE     = HADOOP 
	)
GO

CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE EXT.Userdata (
	[registration_dttm] datetime2(7),
	[id] int,
	[first_name] varchar(8000),
	[last_name] varchar(8000),
	[email] varchar(8000),
	[gender] varchar(8000),
	[ip_address] varchar(8000),
	[cc] varchar(8000),
	[country] varchar(8000),
	[birthdate] varchar(8000),
	[salary] float,
	[title] varchar(8000),
	[comments] varchar(8000)
	)
	WITH (
	LOCATION = 'userdata1.parquet',
	DATA_SOURCE = [staging_asablobacct_dfs_core_windows_net],
	FILE_FORMAT = [SynapseParquetFormat],
	REJECT_TYPE = VALUE,
	REJECT_VALUE = 0
	)
GO

SELECT TOP 100 * FROM EXT.Userdata
GO

-- Don't execute if the table is not truncate 
--INSERT INTO dbo.userdata
